title: Berserker
content: of Strain, which causes the Barbarian to suffer -1 to hit on all attacks per stack. The latter allows Berserkers to pick up an item or creature and throw it at a target, dealing Bludgeoning damage and knocking it Prone. Note that the strength of the Barbarian determines the amount of weight that can be thrown. Heavier items or characters, deal more damage.
